r2b.apps.utils.log

Class RemoteReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • r2b.apps.utils.log.RemoteReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver

    public class RemoteReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receiver
    Send logs to a file receiver and when close send this file to the server. It can send the file compressed.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RemoteReceiver getInstance(Context context,
                                         java.lang.String requestURL,
                                         boolean sendOnlyOnError)
        Create a remote receiver to send log file to a server. If you not use an existing receiver on each start you send the previous execution logs.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        requestURL - The server url to send files. (recommended), null create new one.
        sendOnlyOnError - True send log only when 'e' is call. False always.

      • isSendOnlyOnError

        public boolean isSendOnlyOnError()
        Returns:
        sendOnlyOnError
